articles.title: Australia duo create history with record-breaking partnership - ICC Cricket
articles.description: Cameron Green and Josh Hazlewood recorded the highest stand for the 10th wicket against New Zealand and the fourth best overall by an Australian pair.
articles.content: The stand was just Australia's sixth of 100 runs or more for the 10th wicket in Test cricket and helped the reigning ICC World Test Championship winners post a big score of 383 in their first innings… [+954 chars]
